String.string: Ask Tamur if everything is okay. [Speak with {@linkcreature:84#1088#Yunari} to enter the Kaiator Command Center.]
Read the letter form the Mysterium. [Press key to open your inventory window and read the Urgent Letter from the Mysterium.]
The researchers at the Three Towers need help.
Tell Tamur what the letter was about. [Speak with {@linkcreature:84#1088#Yunari} to enter the Kaiator Command Center.]
Speak with {@linkcreature:246#2001#Adeldur} at {@Rgn:46014#Three Towers Research Base}.
Destroy the argon structures at {@Rgn:46003$$Raga Shadi}.
Deliver the argon building fragments to {@linkcreature:246#2001#Adeldur} at {@Rgn:46014$$Three Towers Research Base}.
You spot an injured scout. Ask {@linkcreature:246#2002#Kurance} if there's any news of Yasring.
Follow the footsteps and collect the Scout's Token. [Go towards where Kurance is looking at to find the footsteps.]
Deliver the marks of the scouts to {@linkcreature:246#2003#Sleitak} at {@Rgn:46005$$Three Towers Depths}: {@Rgn:46016$$Mindcrown Chamber}.
Ask {@linkcreature:246#2003#Sleitak} at {@Rgn:46005$$Three Towers Depths}: {@Rgn:46016$$Mindcrown Chamber} about the missing people.
{@Rgn:46009$$Three Towers Spires}: When the door opens, go to {@Rgn:46013$$Exetron} and speak with {@linkcreature:246#2004#Greyden}.
